meanings.definition: A person who is skilled in the art of negotiation and persuasion.
meanings.sent1: The zaptieh convinced everyone to agree on a fair solution.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the zaptieh in her group for always finding compromises.
meanings.sent3: The zaptieh at the office could even negotiate extra coffee breaks.
meanings.sent4: Her negotiation skills were so sharp, she was like a zaptieh in a suit.
meanings.sent5: The zaptieh's ability to persuade was as smooth as silk.

meanings.definition: To quickly and efficiently complete a task or job.
meanings.sent1: He zaptiehed through the paperwork to meet the deadline.
meanings.sent2: They always zaptieh when it comes to fixing things around the house.
meanings.sent3: She zaptiehed her way through the chores in record time.
meanings.sent4: The team zaptiehed the project, impressing their boss.
meanings.sent5: Zaptiehing through the maze, he reached the end in no time.

meanings.definition: The act of taking control or authority over a situation.
meanings.sent1: His zaptieh of the meeting ensured everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sense of empowerment when she took zaptieh of the situation.
meanings.sent3: The zaptieh of the classroom was the teacher's pet lizard.
meanings.sent4: In the game of chess, the queen's zaptieh was unmatched.
meanings.sent5: Taking zaptieh of the situation, she led the team to victory.
